minima_latex: The function has one global minimum at: $f(x^*)=-39.16599\textbf{n}$ at $\textbf{x}^{\ast} = (-2.903534, ..., -2.903534)$.

name: Sum Squares
references: ['omin Jamil and Xin-She Yang, A literature survey of benchmark functions for global optimization problems, Int. Hedar, “Global Optimization Test Problems,” [Available Online']
minima_latex: The function has one global minimum $f(\mathbf{x}^{\ast})=0$ at $\mathbf{x}^{\ast}=0$.

name: Three-Hump Camel
references: ['https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Test_functions_for_optimization', 'http://www.sfu.ca/~ssurjano/camel3.html']
minima_latex: The function has one global minimum $f(\textbf{x}^{\ast})=0$ at $\textbf{x}^{\ast} = (0, 0)$.
